title: Disney Teases Star Wars Game Announcement - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.13.21
description:
Go to http://purple.com/kindafunny10 and use promo code kindafunny10 for 10% off any order of $200 or more!

Visit http://bit.ly/DSHCFunny to pre-order Demon Slayer - Kimetsu No Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles!

Go to http://buyraycon.com/kfgd to get 15% off your first Raycon order!

Tim and Andy talk about what Star Wars game announcement could happen in December, Switch OLED sales, and a new studio called Possibility Space.
